website_summaries.verdict: A bright, dramatic red wig that comes at an extremely affordable price.
pros: Adjustable size that fits most heads without the use of pins or tape
Attractive curly style and bright color that suits a range of costumes
Comes with wig cap and comb included
cons: Some users found it too shiny

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I attached some pics for your perusal
customer_reviews.text: At first, I never thought this wig would fit my complexion. But now, I am confident wearing it outdoors. I needed a change and I was brave enough to purchase and then wear the wig. I love it. I attached some pics for your perusal.
customer_reviews.author: Kizelle

customer_reviews.title: Great wig
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig. I bought it to do Ariel shows, and now I use it all the time for other events. It's full, nice texture, doesn't shed much, and is easy to style. I've already worn it as Ariel, a leprechaun, an emcee at a vaudeville event, and to do a burlesque routine.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Wig!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought a lot of wigs online, and I have to say that the quality of this one far outshone the others I've worn. This was for my Hipster Ariel costume, and it's definitely a perfect color--a really pretty and bright red. It was also easy to manage and style unlike others where snarls cropped up every two seconds. I had a few people even think it was my real hair, so... win/win? I'll definitely buy a wig from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: historicalsloveme22

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and feel of this wig! It’s a synthetic material with a naturalistic weight and feel. It is a thousand times better than an Halloween wig you’d find in any average retail store such as Target or Party City. It comes with a wig cap and brush and has built-in adjustable elastic sizers for comfort. I plan to use it for my mermaid costume this Halloween!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good wig. Good "hair"
customer_reviews.text: Good wig. Good "hair". Will work fine for the costume I'm planning. My only problem is the "bangs", which aren't really bangs at all. I'm probably going to have to cut them to make the wig wearable, and that makes me nervous. The one photo makes it look simple just to pick a "part" and sweep them to the side. It's not that easy and they won't stay where you put them without being sprayed--a lot. Still deciding what to do. The wig cap that comes with the wig is excellent and very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: PM in SC

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, small fit.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this because the fit was very small. It may work better on a smaller head or a child or someone with very short hair. To be fair I have long curly hair which made it a challenge. It is cheaply made and hair was falling out of it before I had even taken it out of the package. A disappointing purchase. I returned it for those reasons
customer_reviews.author: Eli Mac

customer_reviews.title: It's aight....
customer_reviews.text: For the price you get what you pay for. The tracks show more towards the temple area on my wig. The cap is non-stretch mesh and is for smaller head sizes. If you're harvesting this for a ponytail wig, I suggest buying two or three based on the thickness you prefer. The strands do need a good wash and oiling up. This smelled a bit out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: meidoC

customer_reviews.title: It got here in a nice timely manner
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with wigs. It got here in a nice timely manner, exactly the day they said it'd come :) The wig fits me really well (I have long hair so it's slightly lumpy/small ish but I'm pretty sure that my hair and inexperience) Overall, I really love the look of it! It doesn't shed much and is fairly comfortable :)
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: You'll get noticed lol
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for the Fourth of July and my clients/dementia patients loved it. So many smiles as they realized it was me under all the red hair! But... The hair is heavy, it is hot, it messes up easily, and I had a rat nest form by midday at the back of my neck which probably has destroyed the polyester fibers. I just haven't had the energy to untangle it. Its a basic costume wig which probably won't last more than a couple uses.
customer_reviews.author: Earthstar

customer_reviews.title: Ariel mermaid costume!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg! This was the perfect wig for my Ariel mermaid costume!! I got a handful of compliments on my entire costume. Is very long with layers. Tends to get tangly but I carried the comb it came with to take care of that thru the night. The bangs were too long for me so I pinned them to the sides with no issues. This wig never slid off and stayed in place all night with my French braids underneath and a cap. Follow me on IG- solovely_verdin for more inspo!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Wig cap is a bit small
customer_reviews.text: I like this colorful wig. It tangled easily because of the long lenght so I cut it instead of buying a shorter wig. The wig cap seems a bit small, I know I don't have an unusually large head, pretty average I think., so it has to be that the wig cap is Small. Oh well, I'll make it work by hair pinning it down.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Great costume wig
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for a halloween costume (Sally from the nightmare before Christmas). I was pleasantly surprised by the good quality for the price. It was soft and easily adjustable. Wore it for the whole party and it was not hot at all. I used 2 bobby pins to hold back the bangs, but otherwise the adjustable sizes on the wig held it in place for the whole night. I don't know how it would be for everyday use, but it is a great costume wig.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiMAC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Unless you need a wig for just a simple costume- not a cosplay- I’m talking Halloween costume that you plan on wearing a hat or some type of hair accessory- don’t bother. It’s sooo cheaply made, the bangs are impossibly long for any human women/mans head shape. Unless you’re a cone head- then this is the piece for you sis. It’s shiny, looks fake, feels fake. Tangled easily and the crown shows.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Moon

customer_reviews.title: Good for what I got it for
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't the red I was expecting. I was hoping for a dark red like in the picture, but the one I got seemed a bit more bright red. It is still pretty, but not what I was anticipating. It was also strangely small, and I have a very normal sized head. I didn't expect very much because it is a costume wig, and is priced very reasonably. It works for what I got it for but I probably won't order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: This wig looks nothing like the photo. It’s made with really cheap shiny, synthetic material. I’ve bought another wig in the past that used this exact photo for reference and it’s much nicer than this one. This one is more of a one time use costume one as it started to tangle as soon as I took it out of the package.
customer_reviews.author: V.S.

customer_reviews.title: Has bangs but is amazing otherwise.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful high quality wig. The cap that comes with it is so easy to use and amazing. Unfortunately, I’m going as Jessica Rabbit and this wig has bangs which are difficult to control and make it difficult to see. Going to have to do some last minute rushed shopping. Which is a bummer. But I still give it 5 stars because it’s amazing.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: It's what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for my sister at a discounted price. In my opinion it's exactly what I expected for a costume/cosplay type wig. The color is not exact in the picture due to lighting. It's similar to what you'd by at costume store. It worked perfectly for the Ariel costume.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Goodell

customer_reviews.title: Just like Ariel!
customer_reviews.text: I must have read tons of reviews trying to find the perfect wig for my little mermaid costume, and this was it! I wanted something true to character, but also nothing over the top cartoonish. We attended the Halloween party at Disneyland and I got so many compliments! It made me feel like a true Disney princess. It was super easy to style, and the bangs are long enough so you can either curl them, or trim them. Perfect! I'm so happy, this was an amazing wig for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ligocki

customer_reviews.title: Good for Ariel! 🧜‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: It fit well and stayed on nicely...and I have a pretty large head/tons of reeeeaally long hair, so usually wigs don’t do well on me. It started sliding back towards the end of the night, but only bc I didn’t use Bobby pins or much effort to attempt to keep it in place, I usually get hot and decide to deconstruct my costume before the end of the evening.
customer_reviews.author: MELISSA E

customer_reviews.title: Great for costumes!
customer_reviews.text: Will work perfectly with my costume, comes with a wig cap that's decent at holding your hair but you can also use it to do makeup like scales! The comb that comes with it works surprisingly well at detangling it and the wig itself is close to the picture as shown maybe a looser curl. The bangs are the only thing that bothers me but with some work they are manageable! Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comes with hair net!!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely wig. Came with a hair cap that is works great for keeping my shoulder length hair contained. Two elastic straps on the back with loops sewed on the inside. My head is slightly large so I just end up clipping the straps to each other and it stays in place very well. The black cap for the wig will show through if you try to move the bangs but otherwise works perfectly for what I need it for. Yes the red is VERY bright, think jessica rabbit from who framed Roger rabbit colored.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica C.

customer_reviews.title: Go Red
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wig! I wore it on Halloween for my Mermaid costume. I fooled a lot of people because they didn't recognize me. It looked great but because my head is a little big, it slipped off slowly. I just pulled it down and adjusted it when I felt it slip. Got a lot of compliments on the wig and costume.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMacy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for cosplay
customer_reviews.text: The Whigs nice for cosplay I did a little mermaid but it tangles super easy slowly coming through it from the bottom to the top a ton of the hair came out. Do you still look super cute mad little girl smile. It was good for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S

customer_reviews.title: this wig is great. (The photo attached does have a filter applied
customer_reviews.text: I used this wig for an Ariel costume. It's exactly what you pay for in saying that it's not the quality you would find from an $100+ wig, the hairs will fall out if handled roughly (like roughly brushing through knots). The wig obviously wont look strikingly real, however it doesn't look excessively fake However, this wig lasted me the entire night and helped me achieve the look i was trying for. If you're looking for a cheep wig for a costume that you don't expect to last a long time, this wig is great. (The photo attached does have a filter applied, the wig is a lot less vibrant in person, photo is more for styling than color)
customer_reviews.author: alanah wood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wig that lasts at a great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wig at a great value and has lasted me 3 years!!! I have a lot of hair and it was quite comfortable. It wasn't real itchy and i was able to wear it for my role of Poison Ivy all night! My only problem was getting it on which seems to just come with the territory of having a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Ariel
customer_reviews.text: Used it as my Halloween costume. The material is well cheap. But it did lay on my head just fine (and per my husband, I have a big head 😏). It worked well as a costume or for cosplay. But not for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Abi

customer_reviews.title: No fuss, price is right
customer_reviews.text: Ok I am loving this wig! I haven't bought a wig since my high school play a shameful number of years ago, but this was easy to figure out. It is already beautifully styled, I haven't had to mess with it too much, and for the price I just truly amazed how pain-free the experience has been. It even comes with a wig cap. I remember hating the last wig I wore (so itchy), so I was very apprehensive, but I can honestly say I recommend this one. I had some trouble getting the bangs into the right place but I'm sure that was my own ineptitude and lack of practice wearing wigs, not any problem with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah T.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement Ariel wig for Halloween when one I purchased from a costume ship for double the price wasn’t as red as advertised AND they didn’t allow returns. This wig is luxurious! It’s soft and easy to style (you can even heat style it which I could not do to my more expensive wig). It came nicely packaged and included a wig cap and comb (again, something I didn’t get for twice my money). I am very pleased with this wig. I cannot wait to wear it next weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Bramblett

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wig for my Roxy Rocket cosplay and I’m so happy I did. I own several more expensive wigs and this one is softer and SUCH a wonderful quality- especially for the price! I’ll be keeping this brand in mind for future purchases. Only complaint is that the wig cap built into the wig was a bit small, but I also have a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C.

customer_reviews.title: its cute
customer_reviews.text: its deff cute for around halloween but to actually wear it out as and every day wig i wouldnt and could never but i still have this wig and its natted up but i cant still do what i need to do with it
customer_reviews.author: Kashaundra

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Good wig at a reasonable price. I usually have my hair stylist help me with costume wigs but I didn’t have to do much myself to get it to look just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Wig cap way too tiny!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is cheap in cost so I did not expect much. For the price, the wig is very soft and packaged well. However, I’m giving it a 1 star because the wig cap and combs are so tiny you cannot easily get it on your head. It is made for a child’s head. I didn’t expect it to look realistic but I did expect to get it on my head 🙄. Don’t waste your time with this cosplay wig. Get the one that’s slightly more expensive so it fits your noggin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: So wig wasn’t as I expected. Runs a little small and it didn’t have enough hair. I had a hard time styling it to cover up the areas where you could see the hair cover. But it was a cute wig for what I paid for. Loved the color.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: For a first time wig buyer I am happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: For a first time wig buyer I am happy with this product. The price was right and it actually fit my head. My head is about 19" and normally hats are to big. I didn't think it was to hot on my head but that was just trying it on. I plan on wearing this on Halloween so it might get hot with a couple hours wear but it might be welcomed if it's cold outside. For $15 this was definitely a fun item. I ordered the red and am happy with the color. Might order another color.
customer_reviews.author: Optimistic 2017

customer_reviews.title: Useful for a lot of different costumes
customer_reviews.text: Useful for lots of different costumes. It is very very nice for the price. It gets tangled a little easy bu but brushing it is a bit relaxing! I recommend buying a styrofoam head to keep it on as that keeps it looking nice for longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Roach

customer_reviews.title: Good red wig
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the better play wigs I have owned. Plus I loved the color. I wore it to a concert and it held up well. I did not have to use any Bobby pins to hold it on. There are built in straps that really hold it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Laura S

customer_reviews.title: A bit awkward to style but, well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: There are some very short peices randomly throughout the wig that makes styling about cumbersome but overall, a nice product considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Potters

customer_reviews.title: Sally Costume
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's Sally costume (Nightmare Before Christmas). It's really soft, easy to comb. Good quality. Arrived quickly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Semi decent Wig
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not using this for a Poison Ivy costume. The wig was just OK. You're not gonna get it to look as nice as the picture, or even close. But for a budget costume it'll do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Drakelb

customer_reviews.title: the wig doesn’t look as good as the picture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this just because I wanted to get something cheap to start wearing wigs. For me, the wig doesn’t look as good as the picture. The netting on the inside is black so it’s very visible through the hair. The bangs and the layers were just so oddly styled. The wig was too small for my head, but it should be fine for a child or teen for a Halloween costume
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dean

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Looks pretty much like the picture. Maybe slightly lighter? But everything will look a little different with different lighting and different cameras. It's got some nice waves/soft curls, comes with a wig cap, and even a little wig comb! Arrived quickly and undamaged. Overall very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Mermaid Costume
customer_reviews.text: My friend played Ariel for my niece's birthday party and the wig was perfect! Great quality and very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy, it's crap
customer_reviews.text: The wig is too small to wear even in a regular head the hair is already breaking off and I just took it out. It looks good on the website but it's a waste of money. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina R.

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: The cap part of the wig is smaller than usual so it does not fit a regular size head. The wig is also shedding a lot and hasn’t even been worn except to try it on
customer_reviews.author: Damaris Martinez Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Not very thick and meant for smaller heads
customer_reviews.text: The color is great and the wig is soft but the hair is quite thin and looks pretty fake. I have very thick hair and can't fit it on my head right with all my hair. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ufab

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this for the price. It's very soft and great for a costume. It's very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Super deal for a halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Such a great quality wig for the price! It even came with a comb and a hair net. It looks a lot longer in person than it does in the photo. It hits my lower back, so it's definitely versatile!
customer_reviews.author: ene3

customer_reviews.title: Enaia Jin cosplay
customer_reviews.text: Bought to cosplay En from the Skin&Earth comics/album by LIGHTS — perfect shade of red, excellent length and thickness. The bangs/fringe are pretty easily adjustable. However, it gets tangled VERY easily but takes a lot of patience and effort to work out, and if you try and swoop all the hair over one shoulder, the mesh(?) cap part becomes visible at the base of your skull, which is mildly irksome. Overall though, great wig for a great price tag — first one I’ve ever owned, and I was pretty impressed!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful wig. Much smaller than I thought it would be from measurements given. I have a fairly small head and it had a headache until I removed it. Granted, I don’t often wear wigs. It was a very red color and long. I sprayed the wig with a lot of leave in conditioner which helped it not tangle. I loved that the wig came with a comb which was the perfect size to store in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Used by 10 year old for costume
customer_reviews.text: Not bad quality but difficulty keeping on head. Used by 10 year old girl for Ariel costume
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Shows the tracks
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like it. It looks too fake on, too shiny and you could see the tracks through it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Onisiforou

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but cheap
customer_reviews.text: I probably would not buy this again. The only reason I gave it three stars is because it was comfortable to wear and because the color is what I expected it to be. But in person it looks like a wig from party city, a lot more shiny than the picture shows and generally looks extremely cheap. Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lilith DeGeorge

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much from This with the price, but it’s really awesome and came with a wig cap to hide your hair and a wig comb. Worked perfect for my Ariel costume
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cherry Red perfect for Ariel
customer_reviews.text: Definitely good for the money although it tangles pretty easily. You can see the netting if you're not careful when styling, but it's perfect for costumes. I used it for an Ariel Halloween costume and it definitely served its purpose well. The bangs were great after some teasing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Good wig for a Halloween Costume.
customer_reviews.text: This was for a Halloween Costume. It worked as expected. The hair was a bit tangled, but was able to straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Forton

customer_reviews.title: Super fun wig - good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This wig was amazing for the price. The only reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is because you can kind of see the black band on the top, but you can style the bangs to cover it. I used it for my Ariel costume for Halloween and it worked out great!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good Wig
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time wearing a wig. It was not hard to put on as long you follow the instructions given. It matched very well for my halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Gatita15

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Wig
customer_reviews.text: The wig is quite attractive and feels very soft, can hardly wait to wear it with my Mermaid costume!
customer_reviews.author: Ann D.

customer_reviews.title: Love...❤
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it!!! Im going to dress as Sally for halloween this yr, so I decided to get this to go with costume! I'm very pleased... 🤗❤
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Mmhm?
customer_reviews.text: The wig is great material but the wig cap with it do not work. And it’s difficult to put on.
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Not great, Not horrible
customer_reviews.text: The cap piece attached to the wig is a bit tight and gives me a migraine if worn for more than 1/2 an hour, so if you’re going to an all day convention maybe not an ideal product, and the cap was visible through the hairline though that can be fixed with some styling. Over all not bad and definitely workable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Its a cosplay wig. Wear a hat kinda unit.
customer_reviews.text: It tangles. Not soft. Gotta wear a hat. Its. Cute. But definitely not high quality. Way cosplay. Dont even think about adding heat.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Smith

customer_reviews.title: this wig is great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wig to use as part of a Halloween costume and I was not expecting much as the price was much lower than many I had looked at. In my opinion, this wig is great quality for the price. It does tend to tangle just a bit, but the comb provided helps take care of that quickly and easily. The hair is soft, does not lose its wave, and I have experienced minimal shedding. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ariel Wig
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect wig for my Ariel costume. It is well made and feels super soft. It even came with a comb to help when styling it. My only issue was that when I tightened the wig with the hooks on the inside, it gave me the worst headache ever. I finally had to undo them and go as is. The wig still felt secure enough without it being tightened.
customer_reviews.author: Cici329

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for Poison Ivy Costume
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it sheds but that's expected with any wig really. For the price it's a very nice and comfortable piece. I received many compliments on it and can't wait to use it for other costumes. Comes with a comb, some care info, and a wig cap.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Leanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Red for Poison Ivy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig for a Poison Ivy costume at Halloween and it did not disappoint! Beautiful, vibrant color, long and just the right amount of bang (we held the bangs in place with a headband). It was decent quality, fit well and perfect for our purpose. Also came with a wig cap - a must if you're going to wear a wig.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Love this wig!
customer_reviews.text: This wig fit perfectly and stayed in place all night. It brushed nicely and I didn't notice many fallen/loose hairs. If I were gutsy enough I would wear this on days other than Halloween. I loved it. This past Halloween was Jessica Rabbit next I'm thinking Ariel.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Holiday

customer_reviews.title: More of an orange red
customer_reviews.text: I know color is hard to tell when you are ordering online. It is really cute but it's not as vibrant as pictured and has more of an orange hue to it. Still a good buy for my poison ivy costume
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig
customer_reviews.text: This is nice for a synthetic wig. It looks great and I love the sizers in it. I originally bought this for an Ariel costume. I've now used it for 2 other events and it's holding up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Kari & Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking.
customer_reviews.text: It wouldn’t stay on. The hair kept falling out of the wig. It was a mess. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: shelley

customer_reviews.title: The wigs for her size were 2-3x more expensive than this and didn't look all that great. This came in it's bag
customer_reviews.text: Used for my 5 year old daughter's Little Mermaid costume. The wigs for her size were 2-3x more expensive than this and didn't look all that great. This came in it's bag, folded and neat, and all we had to do was place the wig in a spot where it could stretch out. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: MrBurrito

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Super impressed with this wig! I used it for an Ariel costume and it was perfect. The bangs seemed a little short at first but once I got it on my head correctly it was great. Its cut nicely and has style and it doesn't look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wig!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wig so much! It took me a while to figure out how to arrange the bangs properly, but once I did it looked great. Its also very comfortable to wear thanks to the wig cap. Obviously this is not meant to wear on a daily basis, but for music festivals/ halloween / any other time you want to dress up, it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: loved it
customer_reviews.text: loved the quality and easy to use, it does shed a lot but for price good
customer_reviews.author: PINKY PINKSTAR

customer_reviews.title: Wig looks good, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use wig, looks great. Only thing after about an hour of wear, it was giving me a headache, was a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Good wig for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking wig. Only downside is trying to hide the black netting the red "hairs" are attached to. (I needed to part the bangs in the front a certain way.) Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: R3KIND7E

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Wig
customer_reviews.text: Horrible horrible wig !!! The tracks completely showed !!!! I couldn’t style it or anything !!! There was no way to wear this wig without looking ridiculous :( the only positive was the softness of the wig but that is ALL. Very disappointed now I have no wig for my Halloween party
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Gomez

customer_reviews.title: impressed of quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's pretty good quality! My daughter wore it for a little mermaid costume and it fit her beautifully, a little big but I didn't tighten it up and looks good on an adult too.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Barber

customer_reviews.title: It looks fantastic, but the quality is not as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks fantastic, but the quality is not as good as I had hoped. It tangles and gets mated easily. I would return it but it's been worn for a show.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fun!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wig to complete a Jessica Rabbit fantasy costume, and it was perfect! It looked fake as hell, but that was kind of the point. The wig comes with a comb and a resealable bag, which is really handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Frame

customer_reviews.title: Great wig!! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wig and could not believe how nice it was when it arrived. I ordered based on reviews and the great price...wig was exactly as described and pictured. I had to trim up bangs a little but it fit great and was comfortable to wear all night. I will only purchase wigs now from this seller!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This wig is really nice for the price! it’s kinda thin but if you don’t plan on styling it too much that shouldn’t be an issue. it looks a bit different irl than in the picture shown here but still it’s pretty good. The photos i’ve included are after i cut and styled it! it was much longer when it first came in
customer_reviews.author: Aidann

customer_reviews.title: Great for Halloween costume
customer_reviews.text: Just tried on this wig for my Halloween costume and it’s great, just what I needed to be Wendy the Wendy’s mascot. Bangs are cute and the hair is easily braided into pig tails.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Eggen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was so hesitant to order a wig online since they’re usually terrible quality. This isn’t the usual wig! It was soft and looked great for my Sally costume. Comes with a brush and wig cap. Stayed in place all night and I didn’t need to play with it at all. I got so many compliments on this wig! If I need one again, I will definitely be purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: I wish it fit though because I loved how soft it was and how realistic it looked
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my head. It constantly slips off. I wish it fit though because I loved how soft it was and how realistic it looked. I posted a picture of me wearing it on facebook and several friends thought I actually dyed my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Mann

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit and quality are terrible. The cut is way different than the pictures too. Just not good.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described by seller. Loved the wig comb and cap that came with it. Thanks for selling!
customer_reviews.author: rmsteph

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for Halloween. The hair arrived without any tangles or creases. Looks exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Shulko

customer_reviews.title: Nice wig
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great wig. It fit nice and I didn’t get too stuffy or sweaty
customer_reviews.author: Irene Whittington

customer_reviews.title: I love it for costumes
customer_reviews.text: Comes with wig cap and comb. I have extremely thick hair and was able to French braid, place the wig cap, and fit the wig. The wig would fall back slightly but I could readjust, and it has two drawstrings to hold in place. To give some insight. I wore this wig for a half marathon as a costume. It stayed in place, AND my head wasn't overheated. I love it for costumes. I don't think the quality could be said for everyday use but I'm not an expert. It is VERY tangled following the race. I have not tried to untangle yet.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I was incredibly disappointed. I didn't expect a lot, but theybmade the netting of the wigcap black, so it shows very prominently when you wear it making it look like something you'd get at the Dollar Tree.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Its really ling of u short..but nice for price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wig for a Halloween party. Good price
customer_reviews.author: Srhody

customer_reviews.title: Looks good for a cheap wig
customer_reviews.text: The wig I received has a little more curl than is shown in the stock photo. The net base of the wig is black, which I think helps to hide my dark brown hair. Also the wig is sufficiently large to put over a big head with short hair. I rarely have to use the straps to make a wig fit smaller, but did with this one.
customer_reviews.author: LongRunsAndLongerNaps

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT
customer_reviews.text: Used 4 Halloween and costume contest, held up well was comfortable color very bright
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great wig for tge price!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this for a poison ivy costume. It looked great! I had to spray a lot of dry shampoo and hairspray on it though because it was too shinny for my linings. I also restyled it and had to cut the bangs because they were right over my eyes. Overall specially considering the price it was a great wig and my first one.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! It looks just like the picture, and it's easy to wear. Going to take some getting used to though, since I don't normally wear wigs. The color is beautiful though.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute. It was supposed to go with my Halloween costume, but it was delivered too late...3 star rating because of that.
customer_reviews.author: louwhoski

customer_reviews.title: Little Mermaid
customer_reviews.text: My wife used it for a celebrity party. Went as Rihanna. It did the job. More of a Little Mermaid color though. But stood out.
customer_reviews.author: jman

customer_reviews.title: It worked for costume but the front was awkward and ...
customer_reviews.text: It worked for costume but the front was awkward and bangs kept falling in my eyes. Hard to pin back as the cut isn't even.
customer_reviews.author: Jara Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Wig is nice length, but bangs are awkward
customer_reviews.text: Wig is nice length, but bangs are awkward. Too much hair was cut for the bangs so it shapes your face weird. And there's really no other way to wear it without a head band or hat. Probably my least favorite wig that I own. The wig's quality is nice, and so is the color. I recommend buying from another user.
customer_reviews.author: Maya Wolves

product_meta.title: EmaxDesign Wigs 28 Inch Cosplay Wig For Women With Wig Cap and Comb (Red)
feature_bullets: The product includes a wig cap and wig comb that helps you have the perfect look for Halloween, concerts, theme parties, weddings, dating, and any other occasion.
The high-quality, Heat Resistant, 100% Japanese Kanekalon fibers make the hair shiny, natural, and soft to the touch.
The size is adjustable, and no pins or tape should be required. It should fit most people's heads.
The item is easy to wash and care for by using a little mild shampoo in cold water.
This cosplay wig for cosplay, events, or daily use comes with a wig cap and wig comb.
